title: I made the switch to a smart litter box, and my cat approves
description: The Whisker Litter-Robot 4 automates what's typically a messy job and even manages your cat's health.

title: These bone-conduction headphones are 'swim-ready'. I put them to the test
description: The H2O Audio Sonar Pro are water-resistant, bone-conduction headphones. I tested to see if it was all marketing or the real deal.
